T02D2262=D1985:25a-3: dpal de kho na nyid grub pa /
T02D2262=D1985:25a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-5: sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-7: lus dang ngag yid legs gnas pas //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-11: de yang ji ltar 'dod pa bsten //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-12: gnyis med ye shes dag pa las //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-13: de ltar min na log par ltung //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-14: de nas sdug bsngal brgyud par 'byung //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-15: de phyir sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-16: mkhas pas dag par sngon 'gro spyad //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-17: ji ltar chu yi thigs pa ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-18: rgya mtshor babs nas lan tshvar 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-19: lan tshva 'o ma'i mtshor zhugs nas //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-20: de nyid slar yang bdud rtsir 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-21: ji ltar dug sbrul de nyid shes //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-22: nus pa 'phrog par byed nus med //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-23: de nyid rgyud gzhan dag la ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-24: lnga po'i gnas skabs las mi 'da' //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-25: gzhan yang 'dod pa zil non na //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-26: 'dod pa nyid ni sman yin no //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-27: ji ltar dug gis gdungs pa la //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-28: dug nyid sman du che ba yin //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-29: ji ltar me yis tshig la me //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-30: tsher mas zug la tsher ma nyid //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-31: de bzhin nyon mongs kyis nyen na //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-32: nyon mongs nyid ni bdud rtser che //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-33: dper na dug gi de nyid shes //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-34: dug zos kyang ni gnod mi 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-35: de bzhin yul gyi de nyid shes //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-36: 'dod pa spyod pas gnod pa med //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-38: 'dam la gnas kyang des mi gos /
T02D2262=D1985:25a-39: de nyid rig pas rtag tu ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-40: 'dod pa rol pas spyad par bya //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-41: de phyir kun nas dogs med par //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-42: khyad par du ni longs spyod 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-43: 'dod pa lnga la brten byas na //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-44: dngos grub myur du nges thob 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-45: dka' thub brtul zhugs gdung ba yis //
T02D2262=D1985:25a-46: khams rnams skam par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-0: skams pas sdug bsngal 'gyur ba @25b ste ;
T02D2262=D1985:25b-1: ; sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g-yeng 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-2: g-yengs pas byang chub gzhan du 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-3: de phyir dngos grub mchog gnyer na //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-4: dka' thub brtul zhugs spyad mi bya //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-5: ji ltar bde bas de bzhin gnos //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-6: bde ba spangs na dngos grub med //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-7: de bas yid 'ong gnas su ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-8: nyams dga'i bu mo bcu gnyis ma //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-9: yid 'ong mig gi dkyus ring ma //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-10: gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par mdzes //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-11: brtan zhing mi g-yo dam tshig can //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-13: chags pa chen po'i ros rol pa //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-14: mchog tu mkhas shing sgeg pa dang //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-15: nyams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-16: rang nyid 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-17: dam tshig can ni rgyud dag pa'i //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-18: nang du nyin mtshan 'du bar bya //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-20: mdzum dang dgod dang rab tu rgod //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-21: myos pa dang ni bcas pa yi //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-22: 'bebs pa rnam pa bdun du bshad //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-23: rengs dang myos dang 'gyur ba dang //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-24: rol dang yul dang shin du 'phel //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-25: rkang pa 'dor dang lag pa bsgyur //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-26: phyag rgya mtshan ma lta stangs dang //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-27: sngangs dang rgod dang drag po sogs //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-28: ki li ki li phreng sgrogs byed //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-29: rol pa dpa' ba rnam par nyed //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-30: sa bskyod ca co'i bye brag ldan //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-31: brgyal ba rab zhi du bas rtogs //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-32: byams shing dga' ba rgya mtsho ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-33: bde ba'i rtags las skyes pa'i 'od //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-34: ngo bo nyid kyis gsal ba'i yid //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-35: gnyis med rnam par gsal ba yi //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-36: rdzu 'phrul mngon shes dag dang ldan //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-37: de ltar bden don rab zhi ba'i //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-38: bye brag bcu gnyis dag gis mdzes //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-39: ae yi cha byad bzang po gang //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-40: dbus su bam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-41: bde ba kun gyi gnas yin te //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-42: sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog / der ni dga' ba skye 'gyur te //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-43: skad cig dbye bas bye ba ni ;
T02D2262=D1985:25b-44: / dga' ba'i grangs kyi rim pa yis //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-45: de dag so sor gsal bar byas //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-46: stong nyid gsum gyi nyams sbyar bas //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-47: thams cad stong nyid rab tu gsal //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-48: de nyid gsal bas dag pa ni //
T02D2262=D1985:25b-50: de phyir mi g-yo phra ba'i yid//
T02D2262=D1985:26a-0: @26a * // ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas mtshon bya //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-1: ji srid gsal bar ma gyur pa //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-2: de srid bsgom pa la 'jug bya //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-3: rab tu gsal ba thob nas ni //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-4: rang dga'i gzugs su skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-5: der ni skad cig ma bzhi dang //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-6: de bzhin du ni dga' ba bzhi//
T02D2262=D1985:26a-7: de la sna tshogs skad cig dang //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-8: rnam par smin pa rnam par nyed //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-9: mtshan nyid med par brjod pa yi //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-10: bye brag mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-11: sna tshogs du ma'i rnam pa can //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-13: rnam smin de las gyur pa ste //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-14: bdag gi bde ba la spyod mdzes //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-15: rnam nyed spyod pa'i bdag nyid de //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-16: bdag gi bde ba la spyod mdzes //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-17: de dag las gzhan mtshan nyid bral //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-18: dga' ba dang po mchog dga' dang //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-19: dga' bral la sogs lhan cig skyes //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-20: dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad bde //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-21: mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag ; dga' bral chags pa bral ba ste //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-22: lhan cig skyes pa de dag spang //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-23: brgyal dang phyi mo phyed tsam dang //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-24: phyi mo zhes bya skad cig gsum //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-25: dam pa'i bde ba rnam par rol //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-26: dbye ba lhan cig skyes pa shes //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-27: brgyal ba kun nas ye shes med //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-28: cung zad shes pa phyi mo'i phyed //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-29: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-30: ye shes phyi mo nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-31: de phyir de nyid ye shes ni //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-32: gnyis med ye shes rab tu gsal //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-33: de la chags dang chags bral med //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-34: gnyi ga ma yin stong nyid min //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-35: kun min thams cad min pa min //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-36: yang na thams cad rnam par thim //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-37: ji ltar char gyi rgyun sna tshogs //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-38: ro gzugs du ma gzhan yin kyang //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-39: snod gcig tu ni zhugs pa na //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-40: zhu nas ro gcig nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-41: de bzhin ye shes bde chen po //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-42: rnam par ngo bo nyid kyis gsal //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-43: gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ;
T02D2262=D1985:26a-44: / chos kun rnam par bcom pas na //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-45: ye shes rgyun 'bab gtong ba'i blo //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-46: mkhas pas de lta bu nyid mtshon //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-47: mi g-yo sgrib bral phra ba yi //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-48: thig le'i gzugs can rtog pa med //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-49: thog mtha' med pa'i de nyid ni //
T02D2262=D1985:26a-50: ma byung ma byas mchog yin no //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-0: skye @26b bo'i chos rnams thams cad kun //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-1: gzhi ni de nyid nyid yin no //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-3: rnal 'byor pa yis de nyid la //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-4: mthong ba de nyid ma mthong bas //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-5: de la phyi rol ci zhig bsam //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-6: de phyir 'khrul pa'i mchod pa sogs //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-7: phyi rol pa yis ci byar yod //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-8: thams cad spangs nas de nyid bsgom //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-10: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyor las //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-11: gang tshe nor bur chud pa na //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-12: man ngag gis ni rlung bzung ste //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-13: de tshe ye shes mthong bas 'grub //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-14: bskal pa mtha' yas par du ni //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-15: der ni 'dod pa yang dag gnas //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-16: 'od gsal ba yi gnas thob nas //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-17: sems can kun gyi phyag byas pa'i //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-18: tha mal snang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-19: bzhi pa'i de nyid la brten bya //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-20: sngon du goms byed rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-22: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas gdab cing //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-23: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas gdab //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-24: rgyu 'bras gcig tu rgyas btab pas //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-25: phyag rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-26: mtshan mo snang ba'i cha yin te //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-27: gsal ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer snang ba 'gyed pa snang ba 'ched pa yin ;
T02D2262=D1985:26b-28: / mtshams ni snang ba thob pa rang gi rang bzhin rnams kyis lan gcig min par 'gro //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-29: mtshan min nyin par min pa mtshan min gang zhig rang bzhin rnams dang rnam bral ba //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-30: de nas byang chub yin par bla ma mchog bshad rnal 'byor pa nyid yul //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-31: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-32: ji ltar nang bzhin phyi rol te //
T02D2262=D1985:26b-34: sgrub pa ru ni rigs pa yin //
